title: Honestly, Trendermind 6/21: Credit Card Companies, Elon Musk, Uvalde, Lightyear, John Eastman
itunes:title: Honestly, Trendermind 6/21: Credit Card Companies, Elon Musk, Uvalde, Lightyear, John Eastman
description:
In this edition of Honestly Trendermind, Jack and Miles discuss credit card companies blocking efforts to track gun sales, Elon Musks' daughter wanting nothing to do with him, the 'abject failure' in Uvalde, Jack's continued bewilderment at the film 'Lightyear', and John Eastman getting all the blame.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
